code:
export var questionObj = {
  "Qtext": "
 
Suppose that
\[
	\frac{p }{b - c } = \frac{q }{c - a } = \frac{r }{a - b }
\]
Then prove that
\[
	ap + bq + cr = 0
\]
\newline

",
  "Steps": [{
    "id": "s1",
    "n_params": 0,
    "step_txt": "
 
It is given that
\[
	\frac{p }{b - c } = \frac{q }{c - a } = \frac{r }{a - b } = k \textrm{ (assume)}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow p = k (b - c ) 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow q = k (c - a )
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow r = k (a - b )
\]
Now, lets consider the given expression
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = ap + bq + cr 
\]
\[
	= ak (b - c ) + bk (c - a ) + ck (a - b )
\]
\[
	= k \left[a (b - c ) + b (c - a ) + c (a - b )\right]
\]
\[
	= k \left[ab - ac + bc - ab + ac - bc \right]
\]
\[
	= k (0)
\]
\[
	= 0 = \textrm{ RHS}
\]
Hence proved.
\newline

"
  }]
};
export var resp = [{
  "data": [],
  "text": " "
}];

sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that
\[
	\frac{p }{b - c } = \frac{q }{c - a } = \frac{r }{a - b }
\]
Then prove that
\[
	ap + bq + cr = 0
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
 
It is given that
\[
	\frac{p }{b - c } = \frac{q }{c - a } = \frac{r }{a - b } = k \textrm{ (assume)}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow p = k (b - c ) 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow q = k (c - a )
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow r = k (a - b )
\]
Now, lets consider the given expression
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = ap + bq + cr 
\]
\[
	= ak (b - c ) + bk (c - a ) + ck (a - b )
\]
\[
	= k \left[a (b - c ) + b (c - a ) + c (a - b )\right]
\]
\[
	= k \left[ab - ac + bc - ab + ac - bc \right]
\]
\[
	= k (0)
\]
\[
	= 0 = \textrm{ RHS}
\]
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}]
